{"id":1012968125,"question_id":2903,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10 months, 1 week","timestamp":1691246714,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1012968125/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Insert Greatest Common Divisors in Linked List","memory":"44.1 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * public class ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode next;\n *     ListNode() {}\n *     ListNode(int val) { this.val = val; }\n *     ListNode(int val, ListNode next) { this.val = val; this.next = next; }\n * }\n */\nclass Solution {\n    public ListNode insertGreatestCommonDivisors(ListNode head) {\n        \n        if(head==null || head.next==null)\n            return head;\n        \n        \n        ListNode curr = head;\n        ListNode next = head.next;\n        \n        while(next!=null){\n            int g = gcd(curr.val, next.val);\n            ListNode node = new ListNode(g);\n            \n            // System.out.println(curr.val + \" \" + node.val + \" \"+ next.val + \" g=\"+g);\n            \n            node.next=next;\n            curr.next = node;\n            curr=next;\n            next=curr.next;\n        }\n        \n        \n        System.out.println(gcd(10, 3));\n        \n        return head;        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n    \n    private int gcd(int a, int b){\n        if(b==0) return a;\n        return gcd(b, a%b);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"insert-greatest-common-divisors-in-linked-list","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
